summary: Comprehensive full-stack testing completed for Development Services Platform. All core functionality working correctly including API endpoints, form submissions, admin dashboard, and responsive design.

design_issues.issue: Services section shows test service data instead of default Development/Deployment/QA services when API returns data

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero, services, process, and CTA sections
Navigation works correctly - links to Services, Process, Admin sections
Quote request form - all fields work, form validation, successful submission
Consultation booking form - all fields work, date/time selection, successful submission
Admin dashboard shows quotes and consultations with proper data
Admin dashboard approve/reject functionality working for both quotes and consultations
Toast notifications appear correctly on form submission and status updates
Responsive design works on mobile (390x844) and tablet (768x1024) viewports
Form data persisting correctly in database
Real-time stats updates in admin dashboard
